name: Chambermaid
description: Each night, choose 2 alive players (not yourself): you learn how many woke tonight due to their ability.
first_night_desc: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
other_night_desc: The Chambermaid points to two players. Show the number signal (0, 1, 2, …) for how many of those players wake tonight for their ability.
